text:
Hi Jaydip,
Thanks for that. I have a custom module in HTML +HUBL and I have paste this code in module JS section. Checked and don't see the message.
So, where do you add this code. And any idea how to target just this module. Thanks

and after that run website in IE browser and check console you get the browser version there and you can also un comment this line from example code `// for ex -> $("<div class='ie-notice'>text for ie</div>").appendTo("body");` and then write css for this ie-notice class :slightly_smiling_face:
